com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security

Class SCUISessionChangeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security.SCUISessionChangeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCUISessionChangeAware

    public class SCUISessionChangeHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISCUISessionChangeAware
    SCUISessionChangeHandler is platform implementation ISCUISessionChangeAware listener that fetches all the needed session and local session attributes in SCUISessionChangeData when the session changes. rasrinivasan

    • Constructor Detail

        public SCUISessionChangeHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • handleSessionChange

        public SCUISessionChangeData handleSessionChange(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                 boolean hasUserChanged)
        Description copied from interface: ISCUISessionChangeAware
        handleSessionChange method is called when Session changes. This method will return all the Session attributes and Local session attributes. uiContext the current UI Context of the type SCUIContext. hasUserChanged is true if user has changed like from guest to actual user; otherwise false. hashMap containing all the session attribute that need to be saved in new session.
        Specified by:
        handleSessionChange in interface ISCUISessionChangeAware
